prompt: Photorealistic close-up of a meticulously crafted Elgin pocket watch movement, showcasing intricate gears, jewels, and engravings. The watch is partially disassembled on a clean, dark grey workbench. Focus is razor-sharp on the balance wheel and escapement. Soft, diffused lighting accentuates the details and creates a sense of depth. Background is blurred to emphasize the watch's inner workings. --ar 16:9 --style raw --zoom 1.2
name: value-of-old-elgin-pocket-watches-image-1.png

prompt: A vintage Elgin pocket watch, circa 1910, resting open on a worn leather-bound book. The watch face displays elegant Roman numerals and ornate hands. The book is slightly ajar, revealing aged, yellowed pages with faded ink. Soft, warm light filters in from a nearby window, casting subtle shadows and highlighting the texture of the leather and paper. The scene evokes a sense of nostalgia and timelessness. Shallow depth of field. --ar 16:9 --style raw --zoom 1.1
name: value-of-old-elgin-pocket-watches-image-2.png

prompt: A side-by-side comparison of three Elgin pocket watches from different eras: a simple, utilitarian model from the early 20th century, a highly ornate gold-filled hunter case watch from the Art Deco period, and a military-issued watch from WWII. Each watch is displayed on a separate dark grey pedestal, with subtle variations in lighting to highlight their unique features. The background is a neutral grey gradient. The composition emphasizes the evolution of design and functionality. --ar 16:9 --style raw --zoom 1.0
name: value-of-old-elgin-pocket-watches-image-3.png

prompt: A skilled watchmaker, wearing a magnifying loupe, carefully examines an Elgin pocket watch movement with a set of precision tools. The watchmaker's hands are steady and focused, demonstrating expertise and precision. The workbench is cluttered with watch parts, tools, and reference materials. The scene is bathed in bright, even lighting, creating a sense of clinical precision and craftsmanship. The focus is sharp on the watchmaker's hands and the watch movement. --ar 16:9 --style raw --zoom 1.0
name: value-of-old-elgin-pocket-watches-image-4.png

prompt: An antique Elgin pocket watch displayed inside a glass museum display case, surrounded by historical documents and artifacts related to the Elgin National Watch Company. The watch is illuminated by subtle, focused lighting that highlights its details. The background includes faded photographs of the Elgin factory and advertisements from the early 20th century. The scene evokes a sense of history and preservation. The glass case reflects the ambient light, adding a layer of visual interest. --ar 16:9 --style raw --zoom 1.0
name: value-of-old-elgin-pocket-watches-image-5.png
